name: Tina Phong Iam
story: Tina Phong Iam grew up in a small village in Haiti. She moved to France when she was 20, hoping to find a better life. She struggled to find work, eventually turning to prostitution to make ends meet. She is married, but her husband is unaware of her profession. Tina dreams of leaving the streets and starting a family, but she feels trapped in her current situation.
